timeline.author: UniQP

replies.bodyText: In know this looks a bit awkward, but the other way around Codacy complains with "Issue found: Position literals first in String comparisons"
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText: But we are using constants now, not literals.
replies.author: UniQP

replies.bodyText: Ah, I see. Thanks for pointing that out to me. - I thought, Codacy would handle them the same. Have updated the PR now.
replies.author: moving-bits
